about.summary: Open Source Library for Weather Radar Data Processing

name: wradlib
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.10.0" %}

package:
    name: wradlib
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: wradlib-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/w/wradlib/wradlib-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 8e53792d021f25bd44a096ce20999f57fdd6d21f1c0d3b17d43120f0f69320ef

build:
    number: 1
    script: python setup.py install

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - numpy
        - scipy
        - matplotlib
        - h5py
        - netcdf4
        - gdal 2.2.*
    run:
        - python
        - numpy
        - scipy
        - matplotlib
        - h5py
        - netcdf4
        - gdal 2.2.*

test:
    imports:
        - wradlib  # [not osx]
    commands:
        # hack to get macosx matplotlib running
        # see https://github.com/conda-forge/wradlib-feedstock/pull/20
        - python -c "import matplotlib as mpl; mpl.use('Agg'); import wradlib"  # [osx]

about:
    home: http://wradlib.org/
    license: MIT
    summary: "Open Source Library for Weather Radar Data Processing"

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - jjhelmus
        - kmuehlbauer

about.summary: Open Source Library for Weather Radar Data Processing
